document_data.name: Jirozu no Nakamaru
document_data.mainbody: '''Jirozu no Nakamaru''' was the [[Wa-an dictionary#O|''oyabun'']] of [[Big Head]] [[yakuza]] gang in [[Nakamaru]] around [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Jirozu collected odd and unusual weapons and will payed honest prices for such things (particularly ''gaijin'' items).
document_data.Possessions: Jirozu owned a [[lajatang]], a somewhat rare double-headed weapon.
document_data.History:
Jirozu risen the ranks starting from being a poor waterfront laborer
In 1357, during the feud against [[Black Mist]] gang, he was invited to a peace meeting organized by [[Wa-an dictionary#D|daimyo]] [[Funada Mitsuhide]]. Hoping to ruin Mitsuhide, [[Goshukara Sadamoto]] targeted for death Jirozu sending [[Phoenix clan]] [[Ninja]] to kill him framing [[Funada clan]]
document_data.Personality: Jirozu was very aware of both his power and his social position. He possessed a charming and crafty personality, always appearing friendly. In truth, he evaluated and judged all opportunities of any situations.
